event.title: is found in two inscriptions : one near Rav, dated 1271

data.event: Gedi appears to be a corruption of Ghritaghadya winch is found in two inscriptions : one near Rav, dated 1271 (Samvat 1323), where it is mentioned as a large district under Maldev, a Viceroy of Arjundev king of Anhilwad Patan; and the other in the inscription on the Malan well).

Gedi appears to be a corruption of Ghritaghadya winch is found in two inscriptions : one near Rav, dated 1271 (Samvat 1323), where it is mentioned as a large district under Maldev, a Viceroy of Arjundev king of Anhilwad Patan; and the other in the inscription on the Malan well).

event.title: subdued by the Jadejas, the head of the family had the title of Rana of Gedi until 1947

data.event: Though afterwards subdued by the Jadejas, the head of the family had the title of Rana of Gedi until 1947.
